dao

Interface GenericDAO<K,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - Primary Key type
    E - Entity type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    RoleDAO, RouteDAO, RunDAO, StationDAO, TicketDAO, TimetableDAO, TrainDAO, UserDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericDAOImpl, RoleDAOImpl, RouteDAOImpl, RunDAOImpl, StationDAOImpl, TicketDAOImpl, TimetableDAOImpl, TrainDAOImpl, UserDAOImpl

    public interface GenericDAO<K,E>
